definition: to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)

sentences.english: Many environmental organizations believe that government policy should promote vegetarian diets.
sentences.chinese: 许多环保组织认为，政府政策应促进茹素。

sentences.english: The good news is, these days it is easier than ever to be a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是近来比以往更容易茹素。

sentences.english: To abstain from meat was a serious deviation .
sentences.chinese: 茹素是比较严重的反常行为。

definition: to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
to pray to Buddha/to chant the names of Buddha
to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism)/to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft
food given to Buddhist monks as alms
to cultivate the heart and nurture the character (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation
